comments:
Description:
Exception is thrown out when drag dynamic parameter from library to report.

Build number:
2.2.0.v20070105-1052
eclipse: 3.3.0, JDK: 1.5

Steps to reproduce:
1. New a libary with a sample data source, data set, and a dynamic parameter 
   binding to the data set.
2. New a report, drag the library data source, data set, parameter from 
   Library Explorer to report outline.

Expected result:
No exception is thrown out.

Actual result:
Exception is thrown out.

Error log:
org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.core.runtime.GUIException: Caused by java.lang.NullPointerException.
at org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.core.runtime.GUIException.createGUIException(GUIException.java:76)

According to the error log, the NPE comes from:
org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.internal.ui.views.attributes.section.TextSection.load(TextSection.java:166)

It has been fixed in bug 169647.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 169647 ***
